wsdl:definitions.wsdl:documentation: A web service that performs drug related functions.

wsdl:operation.name: DrugSearch
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Searches for drug information based on the name of the drug.

wsdl:operation.name: DrugSearchWithFormulary
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Searches for drug information based on the name of the drug. Also returns formulary coverage information.

wsdl:operation.name: DrugSearchWithFormularyWithFavorites
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Searches for drug information based on the name of the drug. Also returns formulary coverage information.

wsdl:operation.name: DrugDrugInteraction
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Searches for information regarding drug/drug interactions based on current and proposed medications.

wsdl:operation.name: DrugDrugInteractionV2
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Searches for information regarding drug/drug interactions based on current and proposed medications.

wsdl:operation.name: DrugAllergyInteraction
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Searches for information regarding drug/allergy interactions based on current and proposed medications.

wsdl:operation.name: DrugsByDiagnosis
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Retrieves a list of drugs for a diagnosis list

wsdl:operation.name: DrugsByDiagnosisWithFormulary
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Retrieves a list of drugs for a diagnosis list with formulary coverage

wsdl:operation.name: MaintainProviderDrugFavorites
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Add/deletes to a provider's drug favorites list.

wsdl:operation.name: MaintainProviderDrugFavoritesArray
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Add/deletes to a provider's drug favorites list.

wsdl:operation.name: DrugFoodInteraction
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Returns a list of food interactions for a given drug concept.

wsdl:operation.name: DrugPackageDetails
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Returns drug packaging for a given drug concept.

wsdl:operation.name: ValidateNDCList
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Returns validation information for a given list of comma separated NDCs.

wsdl:operation.name: DrugMonograph
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: SUPERSEDED - Refer to the NewCrop Drug web services test and description web page for the new method of obtaining drug monographs.

wsdl:service.name: Drug
wsdl:service.wsdl:documentation: A web service that performs drug related functions.
